name: Conception: Ore no Kodomo wo Unde Kure!
name_original: Conception: Ore no Kodomo wo Unde Kure!
description:
Conception: Ore no Kodomo wo Unde Kure! is a RPG game developed by Spike Chunsoft and Chime. It came out on 26-04-2012. It was published by Spike Chunsoft. Most rawgers rated the game as "Skip".
You can play Conception: Ore no Kodomo wo Unde Kure! on PSP.
Yoshinori Terasawa produced the game.
